!Wendy: The Gigantic Golem should have been deactivated by now. But it became just like the golems fashioned by the Dwarves activated by crystals and the power of the Starstone. Thanks to Dr. Chaos's work, the power of the Gigantic Golems is greater than it was when the Dwarves cast him out. [Quest _120_PavelsResearch chaos_secretary_wendy_q0120_24.htm|Ask about Dr. Chaos.]
